CustomField.description: FOUK-3982 Used to Store Belron Way of Fitting Issue.
CustomField.label: BWoF Issue

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 1 Assess working environment, identify and use required PPE
value.label: BWOF - Step 1 Assess working environment, identify and use required PPE

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 2 Collect and verify parts against device or workorder
value.label: BWOF - Step 2 Collect and verify parts against device or workorder

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 3 Meet & greet the customer and explain work to be done.
value.label: BWOF - Step 3 Meet & greet the customer and explain work to be done.

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 4 Verify parts against the vehicle
value.label: BWOF - Step 4 Verify parts against the vehicle

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 5 Perform visual inspection with customer, inform customer of pre-existing damage
value.label: BWOF - Step 5 Perform visual inspection with customer, inform customer of pre-existing damage

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 6 Perform technical inspection, apply necessary car protection. ADAS jobs: Add battery support & pre scan vehicle for pre-existing error codes
value.label: BWOF - Step 6 Perform technical inspection, apply necessary car protection. ADAS jobs: Add battery support & pre scan vehicle for pre-existing error codes

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 7 Read vital information & fitting Instructions
value.label: BWOF - Step 7 Read vital information & fitting Instructions

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 8 Clean & prepare glass, install lifting device/s
value.label: BWOF - Step 8 Clean & prepare glass, install lifting device/s

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 9 Decontaminate glass
value.label: BWOF - Step 9 Decontaminate glass

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 10 Remove camera & other sensors, test fit to new glass
value.label: BWOF - Step 10 Remove camera & other sensors, test fit to new glass

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 11 Apply full car protection
value.label: BWOF - Step 11 Apply full car protection

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 12 Check decking height and gaps
value.label: BWOF - Step 12 Check decking height and gaps

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 13 Remove and check parts, store safely
value.label: BWOF - Step 13 Remove and check parts, store safely

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 14 Cut out & remove old windscreen / windshield
value.label: BWOF - Step 14 Cut out & remove old windscreen / windshield

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 15 Inspect old polyurethane & determine where to apply new polyurethane
value.label: BWOF - Step 15 Inspect old polyurethane & determine where to apply new polyurethane

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 16 Inspect & clean pinch weld / aperture and take appropriate corrosion action
value.label: BWOF - Step 16 Inspect & clean pinch weld / aperture and take appropriate corrosion action

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 17 Cut back old polyurethane to required height. Prepare bonding surfaces
value.label: BWOF - Step 17 Cut back old polyurethane to required height. Prepare bonding surfaces

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 18 Prepare bonding surfaces following adhesive system guidelines
value.label: BWOF - Step 18 Prepare bonding surfaces following adhesive system guidelines

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 19 Respect flash off times
value.label: BWOF - Step 19 Respect flash off times

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 20 Extrude new polyurethane at correct angle and speed, note minimum driveaway time
value.label: BWOF - Step 20 Extrude new polyurethane at correct angle and speed, note minimum driveaway time

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 21 Install new glass, check decking height, position & gaps. Secure glass with required support.
value.label: BWOF - Step 21 Install new glass, check decking height, position & gaps. Secure glass with required support.

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 22 Install removed parts & check, connect camera wiring
value.label: BWOF - Step 22 Install removed parts & check, connect camera wiring

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 23 Check functionality of glass features & Head’s Up Display
value.label: BWOF - Step 23 Check functionality of glass features & Head’s Up Display

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 24 Quality Check – respect minimum driveaway times
value.label: BWOF - Step 24 Quality Check – respect minimum driveaway times

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 25 Prepare static or dynamic recalibration: Connect battery support & diagnostic control unit
value.label: BWOF - Step 25 Prepare static or dynamic recalibration: Connect battery support & diagnostic control unit

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 26 Perform static, dynamic or dual recalibration, any sensor resets required & complete post scan
value.label: BWOF - Step 26 Perform static, dynamic or dual recalibration, any sensor resets required & complete post scan

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 27 Thoroughly vacuum affected area & clean fitted glass inside and out, apply rain repellent if applicable
value.label: BWOF - Step 27 Thoroughly vacuum affected area & clean fitted glass inside and out, apply rain repellent if applicable

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 28 Perform final Quality Check
value.label: BWOF - Step 28 Perform final Quality Check

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 29 Inform customer of the work you have done and care you have taken & VAPS fitted
value.label: BWOF - Step 29 Inform customer of the work you have done and care you have taken & VAPS fitted

value.fullName: BWOF - Step 30 Complete paperwork / complete job on device
value.label: BWOF - Step 30 Complete paperwork / complete job on device

value.fullName: Repair Process Not Followed
value.label: Repair Process Not Followed

value.fullName: No Fault Found
value.label: No Fault Found
